SEARCH
Module biblioteka
Package biblioteka.core

Interface Borrowable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Postponable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ElektronineKnyga, Knyga, Leidinys, Zurnalas
public interface Borrowable
Interface for library items that can be borrowed. Defines methods to check if an item is currently taken and to mark it as taken by a borrower until a specific date.
